item.name: config
item.item: Consider this as screen setup fee for Screen Printing or digitization fee for embroidery. It can be defined as fixed fee or based on no. Of colors in artwork.

item.item: This alert is shown to user in design studio when he switch from this printing method to another.

item.item: Related products are shown to customers in addition to the item the customer is looking at.
